column1: The main argument of the petitioner was that the commission prior to arriving at the said conclusion
has not observed the rules of Natural Justice in that inter alia;

column2: The petitioner was not informed of any charge against him;
The petitioner was not informed that he would be accused of any wrongdoing and the
Commission would make any recommendation against him;

That  he  was  not  given  an  opportunity 
for  offering  any  explanation  as  to  why  a
recommendation against him was made by the commission should not be made.
